summ_orig_answer.question: are my deposits with eq bank covered by cdic
summ_orig_answer.answer: deposits made under eq bank and equitable bank are aggregately eligible for insuredic protection up to $100 000 per depositor as outlined in category per depositor.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: yes deposits made under eq bank and equitable bank are aggregately eligible for cdic protection up to $100 000 per insured category per depositor as outlined in cdic s protecting your deposits . for example you re covered for up to $100 000 combined across your individual savings plus account eq bank gics and any deposits in your name that you have with equitable bank. eligible deposits in your joint account are insured separately. eq bank is a trademark of equitable bank. equitable bank is a member of the cdic. dollars

summ_orig_answer.question: how long does eq bank hold my funds for
summ_orig_answer.answer: We hold funds in your account for a period of time after you have made a deposit.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: generally we hold funds deposited by cheque or electronic funds transfer eft for five business days beginning after the date of deposit. this means that funds held will actually become available by the sixth business day when you include the date of deposit. for example if you make a deposit on a monday you can access the funds on the following tuesday. although the deposit is reflected immediately in your account balance you won t be able to withdraw or transfer your funds until the hold period has passed. however during the hold period you still earn interest on the deposit amount. for more details check out our hold funds policy.

summ_orig_answer.question: who is eq bank
summ_orig_answer.answer: eq bank is a bank for people with disabilities and their families.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: eq bank offers canadians a digital banking experience. we launched officially in january 2016 with a commitment to help canadians get the most out of their money. based in toronto eq bank is a trademark of equitable bank. equitable bank is a federally regulated schedule i bank with over 900 employees across canada. dollars

summ_orig_answer.question: who is equitable bank
summ_orig_answer.answer: equitable bank is one of the largest independent banks in Canada.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: equitable bank canada s challenger banktm is the country s ninth largest independent schedule i bank. eq bank is the digital arm of equitable bank. you can learn more by visiting www.equitablebank.ca. dollars

summ_orig_answer.question: how does eq bank make money
summ_orig_answer.answer: good question bank is a branchless bank.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: good question banks typically make money by accepting deposits from customers and then providing loans to other customers and earning interest from those loans. we use the deposits from eq bank to furnish equitable bank s residential and commercial loans and earn interest. as a branchless bank we re able to reduce our operating costs and pass on those savings to you in the form of a great everyday interest rate on the savings plus account.

summ_orig_answer.original_answer: we re always looking for good people check out our latest job postings.

summ_orig_answer.question: how do i open an eq bank account
summ_orig_answer.answer: EQ Bank is a new bank offering a wide range of financial products and services.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: it s really easy you can open an account by visiting www.eqbank.ca and applying online.

summ_orig_answer.question: who can open an eq bank account
summ_orig_answer.answer: All eq bank products and services are subject to change without notice.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: all eq bank customers must be a canadian resident meet their province s age of majority 18 or 19 years old depending on where you live have a social insurance number please note eq bank is not available in quebec.

summ_orig_answer.question: does eq bank pull my credit report when i open an account
summ_orig_answer.answer: As part of our online identity verification process we do a soft credit check meaning your credit score won't be affected and won't be visible to other third parties who view your credit report.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: as part of our online identity verification process we do a soft credit check meaning your credit score won t be affected and won t be visible to other third parties who view your credit report.

summ_orig_answer.question: why do i need to provide my social insurance number sin when opening an account
summ_orig_answer.answer: Interest on savings accounts must be reported to the taxman.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: the income tax act requires all banks to obtain your social insurance number when you open an account that earns interest this includes the savings plus account and gics . banks are required to report the interest you earn each year to the canada revenue agency.

summ_orig_answer.original_answer: we don t officially support access to your savings plus account through mint.

summ_orig_answer.question: does eq bank offer business accounts
summ_orig_answer.answer: If you would like to open a business account, please contact us.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: unfortunately we do not currently offer business accounts. the savings plus account is for personal use only. dollars

summ_orig_answer.question: can i use eq bank if i live outside of canada
summ_orig_answer.answer: Bank accounts can be opened outside of Northern Ireland.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: you can continue to access your existing account while travelling outside of canada. however all eq bank account holders must be canadian residents in order to maintain their account.

summ_orig_answer.question: why is eq bank asking me to verify my identity through canada post
summ_orig_answer.answer: How do I verify my identity?
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: if we re unable to verify your identity through transunion a credit reporting agency you can do so by visiting canada post. similar to showing your government issued photo id at a bank branch we ve partnered with canada post to make verifying your identity as quick and convenient as possible. find the participating canada post outlet that s closest to you.

summ_orig_answer.question: what do i need to bring with me to canada post
summ_orig_answer.answer: The post office is open from 8am to 5pm every day.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: you ll need to bring 1 piece of government issued photo id 1 proof of address document if your photo id doesn t have your current address your canada post dss number see what is my canada post dss number and why is it important? dollars

summ_orig_answer.question: what types of photo id are accepted by canada post
summ_orig_answer.answer: To open an eq bank account, you will need to provide the following information:
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: canada post will validate your identity based on the information you provided for your eq bank account application. your government issued photo id cannot be expired and the first and last name address and birthdate must be an exact match to the information you provided to us. you ll need to show one of the following pieces of government issued photo id canadian driver s license provincial or territorial photo id card canadian secure certificate of indian status canadian passport canadian permanent resident card

summ_orig_answer.question: what proof of address documents do i need to bring to canada post
summ_orig_answer.answer: Here is a list of documents you will need to show to prove your identity when applying for a driver's licence or identification card.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: if your government issued photo id doesn t list your current address you ll also need to show a proof of address document such as recent utility bill residential telephone cable tv public utilities commission hydro gas or water residential lease residential mortgage statement or agreement rental agreement lease agreement of purchase and sale school college or university report card or transcript municipal tax notice canada child tax benefit statement most recent income tax assessment government cheque or government cheque stub with individual s name and address statement of employment insurance benefits paid t4e canada pension plan statement of contributions quebec pension plan statement of participation statement of benefits from provincial workplace safety or insurance board statement of direct deposit for provincial works or provincial disability support program attestation of residence issued by the responsible authorities shelters soup kitchens student senior residence long term care facilities aboriginal reserves work camps statement of old age security t4a or statement of canada pension plan benefits t4ap

summ_orig_answer.question: what is my canada post dss number and why is it important
summ_orig_answer.answer: How do I verify my identity when applying for a loan from transunion?
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: if we re unable to verify your identity through transunion a credit reporting agency you can do so by visiting canada post and providing your dss number. a dss number or barcode is given to canada post so they can validate your identity based on the information in your application on our behalf. your canada post dss number will be emailed to you but if you can t find it feel free to call our customer care team.

summ_orig_answer.question: im trying to open an eq bank account but i dont bank with one of the listed banks what do i do

summ_orig_answer.original_answer: as part of our online identity verification process we may ask you to sign in to one of the banks below to validate your identity atb financial bmo cibc coast capital savings desjardins hsbc laurentian bank meridian national bank rbc scotiabank simplii tangerine td bank vancity if you do not bank with any of the companies listed above you can simply skip this step.

summ_orig_answer.question: why am i being directed to contact transunion to request an online consumer disclosure
summ_orig_answer.answer: A consumer disclosure is an online report of all the information on your credit file and serves as a way for you to check the data that is reported to transunion.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: an online consumer disclosure is a detailed report of all the information on your credit file and serves as a way for you to check the data as reported to transunion. the information you provide in your eq bank application must be an exact match to what is on your transunion credit file.

summ_orig_answer.question: does eq bank look at my credit score when i sign up
summ_orig_answer.answer: opening an eq bank account does not affect your credit score.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: as part of our online identity verification process we conduct a soft credit check which doesn t affect your personal credit score. your credit score is not considered when opening an eq bank account.

summ_orig_answer.question: how do i find my account number
summ_orig_answer.answer: eq bank offers a wide range of financial products and services.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: sign in to eq bank and from the dashboard click on your savings accounts. each account has a unique nine digit number associated with it.

summ_orig_answer.question: how do i deposit a cheque using the eq bank mobile app
summ_orig_answer.answer: How do I deposit a cheque into my eq bank account?
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: it s easy simply sign in to your account using the eq bank mobile app. in the bottom right corner click on deposit. enter the dollar value of the cheque in the amount field then select the account you wish to deposit the funds into. take a photo of both the front and back of the cheque then click deposit.

summ_orig_answer.question: what kind of fees are associated with my savings plus account
summ_orig_answer.answer: Bank of America doesn t charge any monthly banking fees.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: we re all about zero monthly banking fees we don t charge account fees fees for sending or receiving interac e transfers® fees for bill payments overdraft fees or dormant account fees. after all your money is your money. check out the full list of fees we don t charge.

summ_orig_answer.question: how do i set up a direct deposit to my savings plus account
summ_orig_answer.answer: Here is how to set up direct deposit into your eq bank account.
summ_orig_answer.original_answer: using the eq bank mobile app sign in to your account then click on the navigation menu in the top right corner. click on set up direct deposit then download void cheque.
